title: Azure DevOps Extension
overview: Integrate InsightAppSec application security scans into Azure DevOps build and release pipelines
description: The Rapid7 InsightAppSec Azure DevOps extension leverages the InsightAppSec RESTful API to automate web application scanning as part of an Azure DevOps build or release pipeline. The extension provides a variety of configuration options to allow for flexibility when utilized within a pipeline. This includes options for scan timeouts, status monitoring, and gating based on the results of a completed scan. This facilitates the implementation of Dynamic Application Security Testing (DAST) and enables organizations to address application security as part of the software development life cycle.
keyFeatures: Performs web application scanning within an Azure DevOps pipeline
Provides scan gating capability with custom user-defined query
Generates report containing key metrics from scan results

versionHistory.changes: Improved handling of proxy env vars.
Scan Config name can now be entered manually in dropdown list.
Bug fix for duplicated directory name.
Added option to upload report output for both build and release pipelines, added self-populating Scan Config dropdown list.
Added improved error logging for bad requests, all requests are now logged with system.debug set to true.
Bug fix for empty Vulnerability Query with Scan Gating checked, bug fix for undefined report path for release pipelines, replaced XMLHttpRequest module with Axios, added us2 and us3 regions.
Add basic validation to the Vulnerability Query field and additional logging if the vulnerability request fails.
Bug fix to filter Scan Configuration lookup by Application ID.
Additional logging during Application search; add Content-Type and Accept headers on all API requests.
Patch for vulnerability gating; improvements for build/release process.
